item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - api.ovh.com EoL Deprecated Routes
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 13, 09:30 - 09:31 UTC

Oct 30, 10:22 UTC
Scheduled - Time : 13/11/2023 09:30 UTC
Maintenance : Deletion of deprecated API routes
Impacted routes: 

GET /domain/{serviceName}/owo
GET /domain/{serviceName}/owo/{field}

Notes : API routes are deprecated since several months, and are not returning any features that a customer could use, OVHcloud is now deleting those endpoints.
Customers that currently relies on the deprecated functions must stop their usage, otherwise, they will receive HTTP response with status code 404 Not Found after the deletion maintenance.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - ServiceNow OneGate (Production)/ Help Centre portal maintenance
item.description:
Oct 11, 20:57 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 11, 19:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 10, 15:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/10/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 11/10/2023 21:30 UTC
Service impact : Punctual slowness or logoff of the application might be observed during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will update the application to improve security and stability.
Workaround : Help Center will remain accessible https://help.ovhcloud.com along with the Manager https://www.ovh.com/manager. If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency. You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md

item.description:

Resolved - Start time : 06/10/2023 18:00 UTC
End time : 08/10/2023 20:18 UTC
Root cause : Configuration malfunction
Customer calling the french support hotline would not reach our agents.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [Global][Control Panel] - Carbon Calculator
item.description:
Oct 2, 12:19 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 01/10/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 02/10/2023 11:30 UTC
Root cause : The carbon data for september were missing, the carbon calculator invoices generated since yesterday were incompletes.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 2, 10:31 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 01/10/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : The carbon data for september are missing, the carbon calculator invoices generated since yesterday are incompletes
Root cause : This incident was caused by connexion issue during data collection.
Ongoing actions : The data has now been retrieved and we are monitoring the incident to confirm its resolution.

Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - Customer Panel, API and Authentication
item.description:
Jul 11, 16:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/07/2023 08:41 UTC
End Time : 10/07/2023 09:25 UTC
Root cause : A Kubernetes version update was the cause of the incident.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 10, 10:45 UTC
Update - Update : During the K8S incident, we have put the network API into maintenance mode.
You may notice a delay in Delivery/configuration for the HCI / Scale / HGR server ranges.

Jul 10, 09:32 UTC
Monitoring - Start Time : 10/07/2023 08:41 UTC
End Time : 10/07/2023 09:25 UTC
Root cause : Upgrade to K8S. One node in the cluster have been upgraded.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 10, 09:13 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jul 10, 09:11 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/07/2023 08:41 UTC
Service impact : Authentication, Customer Panel and API are partially down.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
